00092 
00093 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointInSegment(double position) const
00094 {
00095        return ((m_a * position + m_b) * position + m_c) * position + m_d;
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationInSegment(double position) const
00100 {
00101        return (m_a * (3 * position) + m_b * 2) * position + m_c;
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationBegin() const
00106 {
00107        return m_c;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetDerivationEnd() const
00112 {
00113        return m_a * 3 + m_b * 2 + m_c;
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00117 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointBegin() const
00118 {
00119        return m_d;
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetPointEnd() const
00124 {
00125        return m_a + m_b + m_c + m_d;
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointBegin() const
00130 {
00131        return m_d + m_c / 3;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 inline i2d::CVector2d CSplineSegment::GetBezierPointEnd() const
00136 {
00137        return m_c + m_d + (m_b - m_c) / 3;
00138 }
00139 
00140 
00141 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentFirst(CSplineSegment& result) const
00142 {
00143        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00144        result.m_b = m_b * 0.25;
00145        result.m_c = m_c * 0.5;
00146        result.m_d = m_d;
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 inline void CSplineSegment::GetHalfSegmentSecond(CSplineSegment& result) const
00151 {
00152        result.m_a = m_a * 0.125;
00153        result.m_b = m_a * 0.375 + m_b * 0.25;
00154        result.m_c = m_a * 0.375 + (m_b + m_c) * 0.5;
00155        result.m_d = m_a * 0.125 + m_b * 0.25 + m_c * 0.5 + m_d;
00156 }
00157
